name: Neon Nights (itch) (Chloe)
description:
PROJECT OVERVIEW:
Neon Nights is a interactive platformer where player goes through levels ranging from easy to hard with challenges in-between. The scenery of the game showcases a night out in a world where everything is retro/Lofi/vaporwave themed. 

Completed version of: https://chanseo.itch.io/retro-lofi-lava-v2
